    import {iVXioActions} from 'ivx-js/modules/data/ivx-io/actions.js'
    public class | source

    iVXioActions

    Adds a layer of transformation to iVXio's host functionality to work with the Action system in iVXjs.

    Constructor Summary

    Public Constructor
    public

    constructor(experience: ExperienceHost)

    Pulls the iVXio's experience host that this class will use to set various experience data.

    Member Summary

    Public Members
    public

    experience: ExperienceHost

    The experience host that will perform the actions to the platform

    Method Summary

    Public Methods
    public

    animatePageElement(eventArgs: object): Promise

    Translates the "animatePageElement" from the platform to iVXjs's action "animateElement."
    public

    formatDateForPlatform(key: string, date: Date): string

    The platform utilizes .NET's time format and requires the date value to be in a specific format for Date/Datetime inputs.

    public

    recordEvent(eventArgs: object): Promise

    Sends the custom event in the event args for the platform to record.
    public

    setConverted(eventArgs: object): Promise

    Sends the setConverted event with a label if one is provided.
    public

    setData(eventArgs: object): Promise

    Sends the setData event to the platform with the key and
    value in the eventArgs.
    public

    setMilestone(eventArgs: object): Promise

    Sends the setMilestone with the milestone defined in the eventArgs object.

    Public Constructors

    public constructor(experience: ExperienceHost) source

    Pulls the iVXio's experience host that this class will use to set various experience data.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    experience ExperienceHost

    current instance of iVXio's experience host.

    Public Members

    public experience: ExperienceHost source

    The experience host that will perform the actions to the platform

    Public Methods

    public animatePageElement(eventArgs: object): Promise source

    Translates the "animatePageElement" from the platform to iVXjs's action "animateElement."

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    eventArgs object

    animate page element's event object with a target id.

    Return:

    Promise

    indicates the animation to an element is finished.

    public formatDateForPlatform(key: string, date: Date): string source

    The platform utilizes .NET's time format and requires the date value to be in a specific format for Date/Datetime inputs.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    key string

    experience key to pull the input display.
    date Date

    the date to transform into .NET safe string.

    Return:

    string

    correctly formatted date string for .NET.

    public recordEvent(eventArgs: object): Promise source

    Sends the custom event in the event args for the platform to record.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    eventArgs object

    all event arguments
    eventArgs.customEvent string

    event name to be recorded by the platform.

    Return:

    Promise

    will indicate if this event was successfully recorded by the platform.

    public setConverted(eventArgs: object): Promise source

    Sends the setConverted event with a label if one is provided.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    eventArgs object

    all event arguments
    eventArgs.label string

    converted label that will be recorded by the platform.

    Return:

    Promise

    will indicate if this setConverted was successful by the platform.

    public setData(eventArgs: object): Promise source

    Sends the setData event to the platform with the key and
    value in the eventArgs.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    eventArgs object

    all event arguments
    eventArgs.key string

    experience data key to be set.
    eventArgs.value string

    experience data value to be set to.

    Return:

    Promise

    will indicate if this data was successfully updated to the platform.

    public setMilestone(eventArgs: object): Promise source

    Sends the setMilestone with the milestone defined in the eventArgs object.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    eventArgs object

    holds the milestone to be send to the platform.
    eventArgs.milestone string

    milestone to be set.

    Return:

    Promise

    indicates if this milestone was set on the platform.
